channel.title: Hi, I'm Jim from SoloPracticeManager.com
channel.description:
I've started a SaaS app [SoloPracticeManager.com][1] for, oddly enough, managing a single-owner client-based business. Originally targeted to life coaches, I've made it general enough for anyone who has clients/students: massage therapists, music teachers, etc.
It is currently ahead of the minimal viable product model and ready for work. I'm trying to get enough users this winter to get into a full beta. I'm offering an open 30-day free trial, but am doing manual billing until I can build the payment system.
Feel free to get in touch with me @jimfmunro or jim@jimfmunro.com
I look forward to more interfacing with this great community. Thanks to Andrey and Ian for getting this together and providing a great podcast.
[1]: http://SoloPracticeManager.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Jim from SoloPracticeManager.com
item.dc:creator: jimm
item.description:
I’ve started a SaaS app SoloPracticeManager.com for, oddly enough, managing a single-owner client-based business. Originally targeted to life coaches, I’ve made it general enough for anyone who has clients/students: massage therapists, music teachers, etc.

It is currently ahead of the minimal viable product model and ready for work. I’m trying to get enough users this winter to get into a full beta. I’m offering an open 30-day free trial, but am doing manual billing until I can build the payment system.

Feel free to get in touch with me @jimfmunro or jim@jimfmunro.com

I look forward to more interfacing with this great community. Thanks to Andrey and Ian for getting this together and providing a great podcast.
